headline: This Company Is Shifting to Tech and Taking Out New Highs
summary: Aptiv (APTV) shows strong technical momentum, hitting new highs on Sept. 9. Shares have a 100% “Buy” rating from Barchart and robust Trend Seeker signals. The stock is trading above key moving averages, with a 22.2% gain in the last month and an 18.34% increase over the past year. Aptiv’s...

headline: Aptiv PLC (APTV) Outpaces Stock Market Gains: What You Should Know
summary: The latest trading day saw Aptiv PLC (APTV) settling at $82.3, representing a +2.31% change from its previous close.
